attributes.action: Fine lockdown breaking mass protest attendees and prosecute the organisers.
attributes.additional_details: We are calling for the police to prioritise the use of CCTV and other evidence to ensure that as many as possible of the attendees of the mass gathering protests of 6th June 2020 are identified and fined for breaches of the Coronavirus Act 2020, and for the full force of the law to be brought to bear on the organisers for inciting others to engage in an activity which will inevitably result in the deaths of innocent people.
attributes.background: Provide specific additional resources to the police and courts to prosecute those involved in today's mass law breaking.
